tasks.objective: [feedback] Create metrics reader - load metrics.jsonl, parse outcomes, compute success rates by model/complexity
[feedback] Wire metrics to routing - adjust complexity thresholds based on historical success rates per model tier
[feedback] Add 'undercity introspect' command - analyze own metrics, identify improvement opportunities, generate tasks
[feedback] Wire experiment framework to grind - randomly assign tasks to variants, track which routing/prompts work better
[feedback] Learn task patterns - cluster similar tasks by objective keywords, track which patterns succeed at which tiers
[context] Build AST indexer - parse TypeScript files, extract function/class/type definitions, store in queryable format for fast lookup
[context] Build dependency graph - map imports/exports between files, identify which files are affected by changes to a given file
[context] Pre-compute file summaries - for each file, generate a 1-2 line description of purpose/exports, cache for fast context loading
[context] Smart context selection - given a task, automatically identify which files/functions are relevant using AST + dependency graph
[metrics] Track success rate per complexity level - which tasks need escalation most?
[learning] Evaluate DSPy for prompt optimization - assess if prompt quality is the bottleneck vs routing/model selection
[continuous] Sync task board with grind - mark tasks complete when merged, update status during execution
[verify] Make spell check non-blocking - spell failures should warn but not fail verification
[onboard] Create 'undercity init' command - interactive/auto-detecting setup for new projects, creates .undercity/ structure
[onboard] Auto-detect project tooling - scan package.json/configs for package manager, test runner, linter, build system
[onboard] Abstract verification loop - replace hardcoded 'pnpm check && pnpm build && pnpm test' with configurable project-specific commands
[onboard] Scout-generated rules - use scout agent to analyze codebase and generate .claude/rules/ with architecture, patterns, conventions
[onboard] Create project profile system - .undercity/profile.json storing learned patterns, failure modes, optimal thresholds per project
[onboard] Self-tuning after tasks - analyze verification failures, adjust complexity routing, update project profile automatically
[portable] Make undercity installable as npm package - 'npx undercity init' or 'pnpm add -D undercity' workflow
[agent-opt] Rewrite oracle cards for agent utility - replace poetic lore with concrete examples, action patterns, or decision heuristics that actually help agents
[agent-opt] Audit all agent prompts (squad definitions) - optimize for task completion, remove fluff, add concrete behavioral guidelines
[periodic] Run semantic-check and fix high-priority density issues
[optimization] Review .claude/rules files for semantic density improvements
[optimization] Convert low-density prose to tables/lists in documentation
[grind] Enhanced verification retry logic - opus tier should get 7 attempts instead of 2, progressive escalation with more retries per tier
[grind] Task conflict detection - before starting task, check if similar task (>70% similarity) is already running
[grind] Improve agent prompts - add instruction to check git log before implementing, return TASK_ALREADY_COMPLETE if work exists
[docs] Add reconciliation to grind workflow docs - explain when to run reconcile, how confidence scoring works
[cli] Add --priority flag to 'undercity add' command for explicit task prioritization
[refactor] Refactor git.ts MergeQueue.processNext method - complexity 18, 2 nested blocks. Simplify merge processing logic
[refactor] Refactor git.ts MergeQueue.processWorktreeBranch method - complexity 17. Extract rebase and merge strategies
[refactor] Reduce primitive obsession in task.ts - 89% primitive args. Introduce typed parameter objects where appropriate
[cli] Add 'undercity update' command - update task objective, priority, tags, or status. Usage: undercity update <task-id> --objective '...' --priority N --tags tag1,tag2
[stabilization] Add real-time grind reporting - show what's happening now, don't wait for completion
[stabilization] Add error boundaries to grind - one task failure shouldn't crash entire grind
[stabilization] Test grind on 10 real tasks, measure success rate, document failures
[stabilization] Make verification retries configurable - currently hardcoded and confusing
[priming] Implement work hook system - write assignment.json to worktree before spawning agent. Assignment survives crashes. Agent reads assignment on startup and enters autonomous mode immediately
tasks.resolution: Implemented writeTaskAssignment in orchestrator.ts, TaskAssignment interface in types.ts

tasks.objective: [priming] Implement per-task checkpoints - write .undercity/checkpoints/{taskId}.json after each significant action. Track: lastAction, modifiedFiles, verificationStatus, attempt number. Enables granular crash recovery
tasks.resolution: Implemented saveCheckpoint in worker.ts at phases: starting, context, executing, verifying, reviewing, committing. Stores in assignment file.

tasks.objective: [priming] Create worker prompt template with propulsion directive - include task assignment, verification requirements, completion protocol, and explicit DO NOT list (no questions, no waiting, no planning before acting)
tasks.resolution: Implemented buildAssignmentContext in worker.ts - injects assignment, recovery context into agent prompt

tasks.objective: [priming] Wire checkpoint recovery to worker spawn - on crash recovery, inject checkpoint context into worker prompt showing previous progress, modified files, and resume point
tasks.resolution: resumeRecovery extracts checkpoints from worktrees before cleanup, stores in recoveredCheckpoints map, injects into new assignment

tasks.objective: [priming] Add worker identity detection from worktree path - worker knows its task ID, branch, and role from directory structure. No need to pass context explicitly
tasks.resolution: Implemented detectAssignmentFromCwd in persistence.ts, exported from index.ts

tasks.objective: [priming] Track verification status per checkpoint - record which verifications (typecheck/test/lint) passed/failed per attempt. Worker sees what already passed and focuses on failures
tasks.resolution: Checkpoints include lastVerification with passed/failed status and errors array. Shown in prompt via buildAssignmentContext.

tasks.objective: [skill] Create undercity as Claude Code skill - expose grind, add, tasks commands as skill invocations. Normal Claude Code session can spawn undercity for autonomous batch work
[skill] Implement handoff protocol - when Claude Code invokes undercity skill, pass current context (files read, decisions made) as handoff content. Undercity workers start with context, not cold
[skill] Implement results return protocol - when undercity completes tasks, return structured summary to calling Claude Code session. Include: tasks completed, files changed, any failures
[witness] Add lightweight health monitoring - detect stuck workers (no checkpoint update in N minutes), log warnings before killing. Pattern from gastown witness
[witness] Implement nudge-before-kill pattern - if worker appears stuck, send context nudge before terminating. Give worker chance to recover
[integration] Add push-after-success option - optionally push to remote after successful merge. Default off, enable with --push flag or config

[recovery] Implement atomic recovery state - replace fragile recovery.json with directory structure: .undercity/active/{taskId}.state and .undercity/completed/{taskId}.done. On crash, scan active/ to resume. Atomic file ops prevent corruption
tasks.resolution: Added BatchMetadata, ActiveTaskState, CompletedTaskState types. Implemented atomic directory-based recovery in persistence.ts. Updated orchestrator to use initializeBatch(), per-task state writes, and directory scanning for recovery.

tasks.objective: [phase3] Build metrics dashboard - display token usage per model, success/failure rates by complexity, cost tracking over time. Integrate with existing live-metrics.ts
[phase3] Create capability ledger - track what task types succeed at each model tier. Use historical data to improve routing decisions. Store in .undercity/capability-ledger.json
In src/commands/mixed.ts, add --dry-run option to grind command definition
In src/commands/mixed-handlers.ts, add dryRun boolean to GrindOptions interface
In src/commands/mixed-handlers.ts, modify handleGrind function to pass dryRun option to Orchestrator and skip actual execution when dryRun is true
In src/orchestrator.ts, add dryRun boolean to ParallelSoloOptions interface and Orchestrator constructor
In src/orchestrator.ts, modify runSingle and runParallel methods to output task plan instead of executing when dryRun is true
In src/worker.ts, add dryRun boolean to SoloOptions interface and TaskWorker constructor
In src/worker.ts, modify runTask method to output execution plan instead of calling executeAgent when dryRun is true
[vocab] Review witness/watchdog terminology - gastown uses witness, evaluate if watchdog/health-monitor/supervisor fits better
tasks.resolution: Using worker health monitoring with standard terms: health check, watchdog timeout, recovery intervention

tasks.objective: [vocab] Review flute/scout terminology - evaluate if these names are clear or should use standard terms like codebase-analyzer
[vocab] Review elevator/merge-queue terminology - is elevator intuitive or should it be merge-queue/merge-pipeline
[vocab] Review oracle terminology - oblique strategy cards, evaluate if this adds value or is just decoration
